Text: This is so good.  The sets and makeup and story is well done, clearly done by a fan of star trek TNG.  I would have enjoyed it even if there was no sex.  its like a new episode of TNG.

"Sam Hain wrote an unofficial sequel to one of TNG’s best stories, ”Yesterday’s Enterprise”, then added the sex scenes later."

http://gammasquad.uproxx.com/2011/04/star-trek-porn-parody-has-more-plot-than-most-hollywood-movies
kurtlane is absolutely right! The production quality on this is EXCELLENT! It's almost like Rick Berman had something to do with it. It fits right in to the series. A/V 9/9 Thanks for the UL!!!
